title: Goldie's Flavours of India
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Indian, Buffet, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Indian food. Centrally located and offers an la carte menu as well as inexpensive buffet with several vegetarian dishes. Owners are always on site and are sensitive to dietary restrictions. Will advise which dishes are vegan, gluten free, etc. New location since summer 09.
